text:
@realDonaldTrump Open the economy, initiate herd immunity and kill people? Or plan for the fallout from an economic depression?

7.5 billion people on earth, if we open economy without a vaccine 1% could die (75 million dead- more than WW II).   #perspective #realDonaldTrump #CoronavirusPandemic
